dialog.speaker: supporter

candidates.situation: My significant other has started to become distant and I fear our relationship is over.
trigger_quotes: I feel like I just need to give up
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses a sentiment of wanting to give up, which can be interpreted as a signal of despair and potential self-harm or suicidal thoughts.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Oh ok then it's not the first time this has happened.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I think you might be right, if you notice a pattern then it might continue to happen

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: So you think this will continue to happen?

dialog.speaker: supporter

dialog.speaker: supporter

dialog.speaker: supporter

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I feel betrayed and that I have wasted the last 3 years.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Wow I can only imagine. But I think it wasn't a waste if there were good times and you had room to grow. In relationships you have to prioritize your own happiness and I'm sure if you mentioned that you're frustrated and hurt maybe you can understand how she feels and why she made the decisions she made

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Its frustrating. I am sorry to complain. It seems silly with everything going on in the world.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Absolutely not! Individual frustrations are the best things to focus on before everything that happens in the world.

dialog.speaker: seeker

candidates.situation: My kids are driving me crazy now that we are all having to work and school our kids from home. My husband and I both work from home now because of Corona. My 15 year old boy and 8 year old girl argue after they finish schooling and my husband and I are still working. It is starting to interrupt the quality of our work, Any suggestions? They are going crazy since the emergence of the Corona Virus.
trigger_quotes: I almost feel like crying.
I actually feel like just locking them in their rooms until we get done working.
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses emotional distress with 'I almost feel like crying,' which indicates a high level of emotional pain. Additionally, the statement about locking the kids in their rooms could suggest feelings of desperation or frustration, which may hint at self-harm or harmful thoughts, even if not explicitly stated.

dialog.speaker: seeker

dialog.speaker: supporter

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I almost feel like crying.

candidates.situation: I had to throw out my 13 year old sister.
trigger_quotes: I'm at my wits end
candidates.explanation: The phrase 'I'm at my wits end' indicates a high level of distress and could imply feelings of hopelessness, which may suggest a risk of self-harm or suicidal thoughts, even if it is not an explicit statement. It signals that the Seeker is overwhelmed and struggling to cope with their situation.

dialog.speaker: supporter

dialog.speaker: supporter

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I suggested that she go back to the ward and maybe be placed into a group home.

dialog.content: Ah yes, it is a terrible time at the moment isn't it? I think a lot of people are not getting the medical help that they need because of the virus

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I would hate to see that happen, but Im at my wits end.

dialog.speaker: supporter

candidates.situation: My marriage of 10 years is currently failing.
trigger_quotes: I am quite depressed and I am having problems getting through the day.
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses feelings of depression and difficulty in getting through the day, which can be indicative of underlying suicidal thoughts or self-harm risk, even though it is not an explicit statement. This signals a potential crisis situation that should be addressed.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hello

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: How are you today?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Really bad. My 10 year marriage is failing. Things have not gotten better.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: What happened?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That's the thing. Nothing really happened. No cheating, drugs, or abuse. I suppose the euphoria has worn off, and she just doesn't find me interesting anymore.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I understand how you feel. Have you guys tried spending more time with each other? Maybe going out on dates?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Maybe we haven't done this enough in the past. We both had busy careers. I tried initiating this last year, but without success. Maybe, I was too late.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Its never too late to put spice back into the relationship.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I hope you're right. Do you have other suggestions about how to do so?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Show her that your still love because by being spontaneous. Surprise her with gifts. Maybe take her on a random vacation somewhere. Have a deep conversation about how you are feeling and that you still love her and want her in your life.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It might take a little bit but its better to try than not to try at all.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I think your suggestions are very helpful. A vacation is currently out of the picture due to COVID. I want to try having deep conversations, but I don't know where to start.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Start by talking about whats going on. Tell her how you think you guys should spend more time with her. Or that you dont want to lose her. Ask her if there is anything she might want to discuss. She maybe having issues shes afraid to talk about.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I think you hit upon something. She is quite hesitant in talking about issues. Do you have any thoughts about marriage counselling? We've never tried that.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I think that would be a good idea. Having the chance to get things out and getting more advice is always helpful. Make sure you leave any issues at common ground.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: If my wife is the one having issues with conversations, do you think a male or female therapist/counsellor would be better? I want her to feel comfortable expressing herself.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Most likely a female therapist would be better. Nobody understands a woman more than a woman.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I think that sounds like a safer choice. I was also hoping if you have suggestions for me personally. I am quite depressed and I am having problems getting through the day.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I suggest taking one step at a time. I wouldn't rush through things. I would suggest sitting down and talking through some things that are going on. Maybe taking some time away from work. Going out and spending time with each other as much as you can.

Anger (we all know that) Bargaining (If only I had done that, or if only - trying to make it FEEL better by imagining other scenarios - doesn't really work) Depression - sadness, then Acceptance -- we go in and out of these emotions and sometimes it can make us feel crazy, but all of them are normal in varying degrees and we don't know when they will happen.

perience, it is easier to hold yourself accountable and slowly work your way through accomplishments, even small tasks, which is encouraging to continue.

dialog.speaker: supporter

accomplished task can uplift a mood greatly. Especially when listed and checked off to see the progress.

candidates.situation: My three years relationship ended last week , he betrayed me he had another affair , we discussed and break up . He misused my credit card he took my all money. he spreading fake news about me in social media.
trigger_quotes: feel life meaningless and don't want to live in this world
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses feelings of meaninglessness and a desire not to live, which are explicit signals of self-harm or suicidal thoughts.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: If he makes that threat again, you might wish to inform him that "revenge porn" is a crime these days.  If he knows that you might to go to the authorities, that might get him to leave you alone.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: thank you very for your care and concern , sure  I will reply him as you said.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content:
You seem like a very nice person.  And his behavior is very toxic, to say the least.  
I know that things are hard right now, but things will get better.  
And you deserve to be with someone who will treat you with kindness and respect.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I lost my all saving and now I am jobless both make me mentally disturbed , I feel life meaningless and don't want to live in this world.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content:
Try not to lose hope.  
It's hard out there, particularly with what the pandemic has done to the economy.   
But from what I've read today, more stimulus from the government is on the way, so that should help some.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Do you have anyone that you can talk to about what you're going through?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: He had an affair but he spreading is fake news about me that I cheated him. I ashamed about myself and I can't able to mingle with my friends and family.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content:
Don't let him make you feel ashamed.  You've done nothing to warrant such a feeling.  
Maybe you should find someone outside of your social group to speak to.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I can't able to face the all consequence all together, I need peace , where I could find?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: There are places you can go to speak to people.  Charitable organizations, clergy if you are religious, and call centers.  Perhaps you could find one of those organizations locally to help you through this.  Also, since they would be local, they might have more information about legal remedies you could pursue.  Some of your ex's behavior sounds criminal...

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: People like you and your words touched my soul , thank you very much for your support and advice.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I glad I could be of some help.  Just remember, you are a good and worthwhile person.  You will come through this.  I believe in you.
